showScrollbar.description: Controls whether the scrollbar appears, only nvue works
showScrollbar.description_zh: 控制是否出现滚动条，仅nvue有效

lowerThreshold.description: How far from the bottom the scrolltolower event is fired
lowerThreshold.description_zh: 距底部多少时触发scrolltolower事件

upperThreshold.description: How far from the top is the scrolltoupper event that triggers the non-nvue event
upperThreshold.description_zh: 距顶部多少时触发scrolltoupper事件，非nvue有效

offsetAccuracy.description: Controls how often the onscroll event fires, only nvue works
offsetAccuracy.description_zh: 控制 onscroll 事件触发的频率，仅nvue有效

enableFlex.description: Enable the flexbox layout. After enabled, the current node declares display: flex to become a flex container and act on its child node, only WeChat Mini Program is valid
enableFlex.description_zh: 启用 flexbox 布局。开启后，当前节点声明了display: flex就会成为flex container，并作用于其孩子节点，仅微信小程序有效

pagingEnabled.description: Whether to display the List in pagination mode, the default value is false
pagingEnabled.description_zh: 是否按分页模式显示List，默认值false

scrollable.description: Whether to allow the list to scroll

scrollIntoView.description: The value should be the ID of a child element (the ID cannot start with a number)
scrollIntoView.description_zh: 值应为某子元素id（id不能以数字开头）

scrollWithAnimation.description: Use animated transitions when setting the scrollbar position
scrollWithAnimation.description_zh: 在设置滚动条位置时使用动画过渡

enableBackToTop.description: When iOS clicks the top status bar and Android double-clicks the title bar, the scroll bar returns to the top, which is only valid for WeChat Mini Programs
enableBackToTop.description_zh: iOS点击顶部状态栏、安卓双击标题栏时，滚动条返回顶部，只对微信小程序有效

preLoadScreen.description: The number of pre-rendered screens before and after the list, 1 represents the height of one screen and 1.5 represents the height of one and a half screens
preLoadScreen.description_zh: 列表前后预渲染的屏数，1代表一个屏幕的高度，1.5代表1个半屏幕高度

events.name: scroll
events.description: Triggered when scrolling to the top

events.name: scrolltolower
events.description: Triggered when scrolling to the bottom
